title: Persist RunRecord with completed ticks
description: Update engine to persist RunRecord with completed ticks. After agent run completes, call state.ToRecord() and store in Task.Run field. Update tick via ticks client. This enables viewing historical run data for completed ticks.
closed_reason: Added SetRunRecord method to ticks.Client that directly updates tick JSON files with run data. Updated engine.runIteration to call SetRunRecord after successful agent runs. Added tests for SetRunRecord. Files modified: internal/ticks/client.go, internal/ticks/client_test.go, internal/engine/engine.go
